_source.short_desc: SmartVault makes it easy to collect, manage, & share documents with a single, integrated document management & client portal solution.
_source.long_desc: SmartVault delivers all the benefits of a cloud drive, but with best-in-class security and productivity features you need to run your business. Create a custom branded client portal for compliant, secure file sharing. Plus get features built for business, including selective sharing, group security management, custom templates, & audit reporting. With the SmartVault Toolbar, you can attach, view and manage documents right from apps like QuickBooks Online, Xero, and FreshBooks.
_source.pricing_details:
SmartVault offers a free trial, after which it is available on monthly and annual subscriptions. Details include:
Standard (minimum 5 users) - $28/user/month or $20/user/month (billed annually) 
Business Pro (minimum 2 users) - $56/user/month or $40/user/month (billed annually) 
Accounting Pro (minimum 2 users) - $56/user/month or $40/user/month (billed annually) 
Enterprise - (minimum 10 users) - Contact SmartVault for details
_source.target_audience: Accountants, bookkeepers, tax professionals, and anyone looking for secure document management & file sharing.

related_products.short_desc: Ranked #1, Clio is the leading legal document management software with the most 5-star reviews. Schedule a live demo to learn more.
related_products.features: Ranked #1, Clio is the leading legal document management software with the most 5-star reviews and the only legal software with 1,000+ reviews. Clio is cloud-based so you can manage your law firm and documents from anywhere. Clio's legal document management software lets you save and edit files on the go, send documents for e-signature, and store an unlimited amount of documents. Schedule a live demo to learn more.

related_products.short_desc: We are the #1 web-based time billing, invoicing and project management software for law firms. Find out why with our 30-day free trial.
related_products.features: TimeSolv helps lawyers increase their billable time and get paid faster as well as featuring comprehensive legal project management tools. We are the most comprehensive, yet easy-to-use cloud legal billing software proven since 1999 with over $5.2 billion billed. Three options for document management, including integrations with NetDocuments and Dropbox. TimeSolv can be used offline and online. Compatible with PCs and Macs, iPad and other tablets,  iPhones and Android App.

related_products.short_desc: Process Street is a modern process management platform for teams.
related_products.features:
Process Street is a modern process management platform for teams. We help teams share their core processes, then transform them into powerful no-code workflows.

Start with employee onboarding to set up new hires for success, then build all sorts of workflows like employee onboarding, client onboarding, and tenant screening.

Manage your team wiki and company handbook 100% free.

Join Salesforce, Colliers, Drift, and 3,000+ other businesses who use Process Street today.

related_products.short_desc: Mobile friendly and secure legal document management software that's intuitive and easy to use. Two-way sync. Encrypted. Try it free.
related_products.features: Join the HIGHEST RATED legal document management software on Capterra! See why tens of thousands of law firms in over 170 countries use PracticePanther to automate their workflows and get more done in less time. Never miss deadlines, get paid faster, seamlessly track billable time & expenses. Work from anywhere, on any device, with our mobile app. It's easy, user-friendly and intuitive. Now you can spend less time managing your firm and more time making money. Try it free, no credit card needed.

related_products.short_desc: MyCase provides centralized, secure legal case document storage in the cloud for quick and easy access, editing, and collaboration.
related_products.features: MyCase provides centralized, secure legal case document storage in the cloud for quick and easy access, editing, and collaboration so you never lose track of a single document. Create a library of documents and folders within each of your cases and share the most up-to-date versions with your team and clients on demand. Maintain instant access to all of your firm's documents whether you're on your mobile phone or on your laptop. Now with MyCase Drive!

related_products.short_desc: AbacusLaw is a turn-key, fully integrated Case Management Solution for firms of all sizes, in all practice areas and jurisdictions.
related_products.features: AbacusLaw includes everything you need to run an organized legal business. Our custom built management system gives you error-free, signature-ready documents and forms in seconds. You can subscribe to court forms for your jurisdiction from within AbacusLaw or create your own library of personalized forms and document templates. Founded in 1983, AbacusLaw can also keep your documents in a private cloud for a complete disaster-proof solution.

related_products.short_desc: #1 Adobe? Acrobat? alternative: PDFelement is your all-in-one PDF solution. Create, edit, convert, and sign PDF files in a better way.
related_products.features:
PDFelement is the easiest way to create, edit, convert and sign PDF documents on Windows and Mac. This alternative to Adobe Acrobat offers enterprise-grade PDF functionalities and perpetual licensing. 

Sold globally in 9 different languages, PDFelement is the all-in-one PDF solution for users of all types, and the only complete PDF solution next to Adobe Acrobat available on Windows, Mac, iOS, & Android.

related_products.short_desc: CosmoLex is the only cloud-based, total practice management, billing, and accounting system (no QuickBooks? required).
related_products.features: Thousands of law firms have switched to CosmoLex - the only cloud-based, law practice management software with built-in, compliant legal accounting (no QuickBooks needed). CosmoLex eliminates the struggle of juggling separate systems for law practice management, billing, and accounting. LawPay credit card processing is also built-in with no fixed monthly fee. Simply log into CosmoLex Cloud - anytime, anywhere - to get everything you need to run your entire law practice. Try free today!

related_products.short_desc: Cull the noise. Find the signal. Logikcull fully automates discovery and legal hold for investigations & disputes of all kinds.
related_products.features: Today, data is no longer information. It's noise. In fact, 97% of all data that gets swept up in disputes and investigations is completely irrelevant. And that noise is making discovery an expensive, complex, and insecure nightmare. That's why we built Logikcull: to cull the noise so you can quickly, affordably, & securely find the data signal. Logikcull automates discovery and legal hold for disputes & investigations. Just drag-n-drop to cull the noise, find the signal, and save thousands.

related_products.short_desc: LEAP is an integrated legal practice and case management software system, enhancing small law firms efficiency and profitability.
related_products.features: As a legal practice and case management software, LEAP helps SME law firms to become more efficient, productive and profitable. Firms using LEAP can manage and store all of their client and matter related information in one electronic file. This information can be accessed from anywhere at any time. Features include automatic time recording, pre-configured matter files for major areas of law and integrated legal forms and precedents.

related_products.short_desc: Cloud-based legal practice management with all the tools you need to run a more productive and profitable law firm.
related_products.features: Run a more productive and profitable law firm from anywhere with Rocket Matter?s powerful document management features. Our intuitive cloud-based software has all the tools you need to go paperless and manage your firm?s documents from anywhere. Create document templates for quick any easy file automation, and take advantage of unlimited document storage. Use Microsoft Word? We have the most robust Office 365 integration in the industry. Schedule a personalized demo to learn more.

similar_products.short_desc: LawVu is the most holistic knowledge base and document management system for in-house legal teams.
similar_products.features:
LawVu is the most holistic knowledge base and document management system for in-house legal teams.

Finding information, documents or historical advice often requires multiple different searches across inboxes, document folders, document management systems, contract management systems and even desperate calls to outside counsel. With LawVu, everything is in one connected system.

similar_products.short_desc: Neos is the legal document management solution that law firms trust to maximize workflow & bottom line. Watch a 2-minute demo.

Our web-based solution puts even more tools in your hands to keep cases organized. Work together on documents with team members in real-time. Locate documents in seconds with custom tagging and advanced search. Save documents to a case with ease. Watch a 2-minute demo and see how to access templates for dozens of case types, customize case libraries & resolve more cases.

similar_products.short_desc: Legal Files case/matter management software is ideal for corporations, universities, governmental agencies and insurance companies.
similar_products.features: Legal Files offers a complete and fully functional document management assembly program as a standard component of its case & matter management application. Fully integrated with Word, Legal Files also offers document assembly. By organizing all your documents, emails, contacts, deadlines, tasks, etc. in one location, Legal Files assures that everyone has access to the most current information. Legal Files is ideal for corporations, universities, government agencies and insurance companies.

similar_products.short_desc: Designed to help you use proven case management best practices, so you don't need to reinvent the wheel.
similar_products.features:
Practice management is case management + business analytics.

Backdocket was designed to use proven case management best practices, so you don't need to reinvent the wheel. Backdocket then adds business analytics to your case management, so you can see what's making your firm successful.

Available at a competitive price, backdocket is also backed by a free demo as well as free tech support and free onboarding for new firms.

similar_products.short_desc: ContractSafe helps companies to better organize signed contracts and avoid missing key dates without spending a lot of time or money.

Email reminders so you'll never forget to renew (or cancel) an important contract.  Collaborate with your whole team-with unlimited users.  No implementation or configuration means you will be up and running right away.  Find out why our customers call us "disruptive" and "a miracle product," and give us five star ratings!

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Court Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Court Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Court Management software provides solutions for case management including docketing, workflow, calendar, concise case summaries, judicial assignments, and more. Court Management software is related to Legal Case Management software, Legal Document Management software, Law Practice Management software, and Legal Billing software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Document Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Document Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Document Management software automates the process of managing documents from creation to storage to distribution throughout an enterprise, increasing efficiency and reducing the cost and clutter of maintaining paper records. Document Management applications provide solutions for a wide range of document needs from low specificity, high volume items such as standard forms to highly specific, low volume items such as one-to-one correspondence. Document Management software is related to Digital IT Asset Management software and Knowledge Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Electronic Discovery software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Electronic Discovery tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Electronic Discovery software, also known as eDiscovery software, enables companies to quickly and cost-efficiently retrieve information from a variety of sources including email, public folders, and company documents by performing searches across headers, body text, and various types of attachments. Many Electronic Discovery applications also provide email and file system archiving features. Electronic Discovery software is related to Law Practice Management software, Legal Case Management software and Legal Document Management software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Entity Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Entity Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Entity Management software and related services enable organizations to maintain a searchable and easily accessible repository of records of one or more legal formations under their control.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Law Practice Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Law Practice Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Law Practice Management software integrates and automates the front and back office activities of legal practices including: calendar management, appointment scheduling, case management, conflict checking, messaging, and more. These applications also often provide integrated solutions for time management, billing and collections as well as accounting. Law Practice Management solutions also provide tools for workflow and document management, marketing and inquiry tracking as well as distributing key data throughout the organization and across multiple office locations. Law Practice Management software is related to Legal Billing software, Legal Case Management software and Professional Services Automation software.

related_categories.meta_description: Find and compare top Legal Case Management software on Capterra, with our free and interactive tool. Quickly browse through hundreds of Legal Case Management tools and systems and narrow down your top choices. Filter by popular features, pricing options, number of users, and read reviews from real users and find a tool that fits your needs.
related_categories.description: Legal Case Management software coordinates documents, scheduling, conflicts, contacts, and reporting associated with legal cases. These applications enable an integrated solution to automate case management, client history tracking, and contracts as well as billing and accounting. Legal Case Management solutions also often include database management, electronic discovery, and automatic document template editing features, enabling organizations to manage, distribute, and update key case-related data. Legal Case Management software is related to Legal Document Management software, Law Practice Management software and Legal Billing software.

related_categories.description: Waiver software makes it possible to create, customize, and e-sign digital waivers, and securely store signed documents.
